member.name: M:UTILERIASERP.Utilerias.MessageBoxERP.Show(System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl,System.String,System.String,System.Windows.MessageBoxButton,System.Windows.MessageBoxImage)
member.summary: Show a modal rad alert box This static method was implemented following the Microsoft pattern for the standard WPF MessageBox but is using the telerik RadWindow internally
member.param: The owner window if needed otherwise null
The title of the message box window. (Parameter is optional)
The buttons the dialog should have - Default is ok
The image the dialog should hold - Default is Warning
member.returns: A message box result enum with the result of the dialog

member.name: M:UTILERIASERP.Utilerias.MessageBoxERP.Show(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Show a modal MessageBoxERP with a message and the window title as option
member.param: The title of the message box window.(Parameter is optional)

member.name: M:UTILERIASERP.Utilerias.MessageBoxERP.Show(System.String,System.String,System.Windows.MessageBoxButton)
member.summary: Show a modal MessageBoxERP with a message a window title and configure the buttons to display
member.param: The title of the message box window.(Parameter is optional)
The buttons the dialog should have - Default is ok

member.name: M:UTILERIASERP.Utilerias.MessageBoxERP.Show(System.String,System.String,System.Windows.MessageBoxButton,System.Windows.MessageBoxImage)
member.summary: Show a modal MessageBoxERP with a message a window title, configure the buttons to display and set the dialogs image
member.param: The title of the message box window.(Parameter is optional)
The buttons the dialog should have - Default is ok
The image the dialog should hold - Default is Warning

member.name: M:UTILERIASERP.Utilerias.MG_UserControl.CrearSecuenciaControlesInputDeGrid(System.Windows.Controls.Grid)
member.summary: Llamando este metodo al iniciar una nueva captura se genera la secuencia de controles y se bloquean de forma automática para no permitir el avance si no se captura el valor requerido.
member.param: Grid padre que contiene los controles del tipo Input de Telerik para secuenciar.

member.name: M:UTILERIASERP.Utilerias.MG_UserControl.LimpiarControlesEventos
member.summary: Con este metodo se limpian los eventos agregados para controlar la secuencia y validación de controles.

member.name: M:UTILERIASERP.Utilerias.MG_UserControl.ReestablecerControles
member.summary: Con este metodo se reestablecen los readonly originales, esto con el fin de conservar el estatus original del readonly incluso despues de que el proceso en la forma los haya cambiado.
